package.name: Crypt_Xtea
package.summary: A class that implements the Tiny Encryption Algorithm (TEA) (New Variant).
package.description: A class that implements the Tiny Encryption Algorithm (TEA) (New Variant). This class does not depend on mcrypt. Encryption is relatively fast, decryption relatively slow. Original code from http://vader.brad.ac.uk/tea/source.shtml#new_ansi
